name: @voilajsx/comet
description: Minimal but powerful Chrome extension framework built with React and UIKit
author: VoilaJSX

scripts.build: npm run build:main && npm run build:content && npm run post-build
scripts.package: npm run build && cd dist && zip -r ../comet-extension.zip .
scripts.post-build: npm run copy-assets && npm run fix-paths
scripts.copy-assets: cp manifest.json dist/ && mkdir -p dist/icons && cp public/icons/* dist/icons/ 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.fix-paths: mv dist/src/pages/popup/index.html dist/popup.html 2>/dev/null || true && mv dist/src/pages/options/index.html dist/options.html 2>/dev/null || true && rm -rf dist/src 2>/dev/null || true
